title: These are the most luxurious anti-ageing facial lifts
text: Wrinkles come to us all, eventually, but what can you do to ward them off? In a world in which anti-ageing products line the shelves of just about everywhere, it's hard to know which one is the best to tackle those pesky wrinkles . But lo! There is a way. And that way is, very often, facial lifting products. You might scoff and say that you've been sold too many beauty lies, and you're not about to fall for this one too, but trust us, you can help yourself with these beauties. So then, the best firming facial creams to lift, plump and rejuvenate your precious skin. 1. Karin Herzog The latest treatment to come out of Dr Paul and Karin Herzog's laboratory, this is a lifting cream surely bestowed by the Gods. Combining the benefits of active oxygen with those of hyaluronic acid, it produces an intense anti-ageing effect. Regenerating the skin, firming the epidermis and redefining the facial contours, it is a treat for your face. After the first month of application, the skin should regain its youthfulness. £112, feelunique.com 2. Ole Henriksen They say it's a miracle worker, Ole Henriksen's firming serum. Oil-free, it lifts and restructures the skin, tightening facial contours and helping to reduce the appearance of expression lines. Your skin will feel plumped and fresh, having had its youth button turned back on. £49, johnlewis.com 3. Sensai Sensai's Re-contouring lift essence has been specially formulated to lift and redefine the contours in your face. It feels fresh on the skin, and its Micro Mesh Uplifter drags up collagen in a battle (that it will win) against sagging skin. Helpfully, it also reduces swelling in the face with skikuwasa extract which promote water metabolism of skin cells. £125, harrods.com 4. Espa Espa's delicious Lift & Firm Moisturiser is everything you've ever asked for - its age-rejuvenating complex, diminishes fine lines and wrinkles. Packed full of sea amber, it stimulates collagen and elastin to lift, firm and strengthen skin's structure. Anise extracts minimise fine lines and wrinkles, and antioxidant larch boosts cell regeneration for younger-looking skin. Just what you're after. £42, espa.com 5. La Prairie La Prairie's Skin Caviar might be just the ticket with its 'unprecedented' offering of exclusive caviar extract to help firm and restore the skin to its youthful form. It might look like a ball pool all for your face, but once those pearls of caviar meet the skin restoratives, the magic comes to life. Use this and see your face appear firmer, more taut and definitely more fabulous. £226, harrods.com Read more • The very best day creams • Our favourite night creams • Anti-ageing top tips: pick up some SPF • The best anti-ageing hand creams @telegoodlife
